name: Crusader Knight
description:
This game is an entry for the Lost Cartridge Jam 3 (2021).
Unleash the power of a knight to destroy evil forces and rescue treasures!

If the HTML version doesn't work, dowload the .exe file

A/D to move left/right.
SPACE to jump.
LMB to attack.

Code/Art
[Gutagi]
Design
